subtitle.translate: Ship cannons and how to use them

description: __**/4/How to use cannons on your ship/4/**__
--/e/Right-click/e/-- your ship with a cannon item in hand to mount it to your ship
Load your ship with **/8/cannonballs/8/** by putting them inside the --ship's inventory--
Ride your ship, then look in the direction of the cannon you want to fire and press your /2/jump/2/ button (**/e/[SPACE]/e/** on your keyboard by default) to /c/fire/c/.
With any pickaxe in your hand, --/e/right-click/e/-- the ship to remove a cannon.
> Each cannon you add to your ship will --/4/slow/4/ it down by **2.5%**--
> Cargo will also slow down your ship, so for example, a ship full of cannonballs will be /4/**10% slower**/4/
